name: The 13th Loop
description:
What went wrong?

What is left in the remains of a memory?  Follow clues to unlock the truth in The 13th Loop, an atmospheric horror puzzle game about love and loss.

The game takes about 30-60 minutes to complete and has mouse and keyboard support as well as gamepad support with adaptive prompts.  Controls are found in the game.

If you stream or let's play the game we'd love to see a link in the comments.
